Description: Fragment of bracelet: rectangular in section with the outer surface slightly convex, of opaque light-green glass. Impressed into the outer surface is an irregular but roughly rectangular, prefabricated group of threads in black, white, and light yellow-green. The threads are of varying widths. Presumably, similar groups were impressed along the entire surface.
Curator's comments: This fragment appears to be an intrusive or surface find.
This fragment is indistinguishable from Roman work.
